documents.document: @AromatherapyDeb Thanks!
@carl49w Thanks! :-)
What's right isn't always popular. What's popular isn't always right. - Howard Cosell http://t.co/hjoPM7i17X
Share our great Thanksgiving quotes with family and friends! http://t.co/fLpIKPsONN
Enjoy today's featured Thanksgiving quote by William Blake! http://t.co/3GwVQsqjNg
@BrainyQuote Happy Thanksgiving to all those celebrating today!
The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest. - William Blake http://t.co/sUzUShMhWu
Enjoy today's featured quote by Thomas Hardy! http://t.co/ghcKabfozd
Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change. - Thomas Hardy http://t.co/ImGhugkquz
Enjoy today's featured quote by Stella Adler! http://t.co/z2FYfXOg7c
You have to get beyond your own precious inner experiences. - Stella Adler http://t.co/Alzmpo2E3i
Enjoy today's featured quote by R. Buckminster Fuller! http://t.co/UgN0Uyl8B0
Don't fight forces, use them. - R. Buckminster Fuller http://t.co/1ZQ1H2dMIq
Enjoy today's featured quote by Abigail Adams! http://t.co/pKXzmWTKPu
Great necessities call out great virtues. - Abigail Adams http://t.co/Gad7JoYnt2
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Greenleaf Whittier! http://t.co/I1D3qaFUgO
All the windows of my heart I open to the day. - John Greenleaf Whittier http://t.co/qTydhOYzzX
Enjoy today's featured quote by Edgar Quinet! http://t.co/xnZ5GgWRY4
Time is the fairest and toughest judge. - Edgar Quinet http://t.co/U5pr3VSog2
Enjoy today's featured quote by Arthur Koestler! http://t.co/EdGQHsMTUt
Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears. - Arthur Koestler http://t.co/9JnsXQ7IgU
Enjoy today's featured quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne! http://t.co/GOjuo02aYu
We must not always talk in the market-place of what happens to us in the forest. - Nathaniel Hawthorne http://t.co/yKks5fBPPp
Enjoy today's featured quote by Harold S. Geneen! http://t.co/UnlwR62tr7
Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned. - Harold S. Geneen http://t.co/i4Z8OTEhMZ
Enjoy today's featured quote by Charles Kettering! http://t.co/NltIbOzCOd
A problem well stated is a problem half-solved. - Charles Kettering http://t.co/yyrLNovofh
Enjoy today's featured quote by John Singer Sargent! http://t.co/wsnWWvwetA
I do not judge, I only chronicle. - John Singer Sargent http://t.co/2eyNQgJHtd
Enjoy today's featured quote by Marguerite Duras! http://t.co/0OfnH29lo2
The best way to fill time is to waste it. - Marguerite Duras http://t.co/jLIZeyWvGY
Enjoy today's featured quote by Mary Astell! http://t.co/T3hx8bFYyc
Truth is strong, and sometime or other will prevail. - Mary Astell http://t.co/eIGZjxEOwa
Enjoy today's featured quote by Thomas Mann! http://t.co/zXwa2wNSoN
Order and simplification are the first steps toward the mastery of a subject. - Thomas Mann http://t.co/5FgJ401grZ
Enjoy today's featured quote by Don Marquis! http://t.co/GkbOQxKKhd
Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday. - Don Marquis http://t.co/aA20uINqRV
Enjoy today's featured quote by Robert Henri! http://t.co/IWMdWFjJWc
Do whatever you do intensely. - Robert Henri http://t.co/U2jTnhfnNk
Enjoy today's featured quote by William Ellery Channing! http://t.co/1i738vze8x
Fix your eyes on perfection and you make almost everything speed towards it. - William Ellery Channing http://t.co/lwY9dMecQd
Enjoy today's featured quote by Claude Levi-Strauss! http://t.co/VNxG81jUBB
The wise man doesn't give the right answers, he poses the right questions. - Claude Levi-Strauss http://t.co/hRtZxdZGFz
Enjoy today's featured quote by Faith Baldwin! http://t.co/dofvmfWHNc
Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations. - Faith Baldwin http://t.co/FqOajhzsFi
Enjoy today's featured quote by Louis Nizer! http://t.co/BrqEWyde1N
I know of no higher fortitude than stubborness in the face of overwhelming odds. - Louis Nizer http://t.co/3NhmSuS7o5
Enjoy today's featured quote by May Sarton! http://t.co/Oc1cHvfXSV
Enjoy today's featured quote by May Sarton! http://t.co/5qPseRNltu
We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be. - May Sarton http://t.co/vzT79kjrXa
Enjoy today's featured quote by Claude Bernard! http://t.co/FzwhQjs4KP
The experimenter who does not know what he is looking for will not understand what he finds. - Claude Bernard http://t.co/12lTTKWCDB
Enjoy today's featured quote by Herodotus! http://t.co/QQ7hpZgv4e
Men trust their ears less than their eyes. - Herodotus http://t.co/RehPKJsdsN
Enjoy today's featured quote by Brenda Ueland! http://t.co/jttTWyiSDk
This is what I learned: that everybody is talented, original and has something important to say. - Brenda Ueland http://t.co/zcFGyCkIwD
Enjoy today's featured quote by Johann Sebastian Bach! http://t.co/6GpwTwNQPR
I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well. - Johann Sebastian Bach http://t.co/Hf4HckC3LS
Enjoy today's featured quote by Don Herold! http://t.co/w2UZPkT2Xr
The brighter you are, the more you have to learn. - Don Herold http://t.co/L0OntSzaaQ
Enjoy today's featured quote by Leo Rosten! http://t.co/NiVId2Bczu
We see things as we are, not as they are. - Leo Rosten http://t.co/fvTl5ptOZ4
A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination. - Nelson Mandela http://t.co/31d8GGvgLn
Enjoy today's featured quote by Charles W. Chesnutt! http://t.co/XfN1FaH1gO
There's time enough, but none to spare. - Charles W. Chesnutt http://t.co/CvVkQak19N
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. - Nelson Mandela http://t.co/31d8GGvgLn
Enjoy today's featured quote by Ivan Illich! http://t.co/ncPLX5Aex8
We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation. - Ivan Illich http://t.co/vSOseYcmlU
@BrainyQuote RIP Nelson Mandela, you will be missed.
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living. - Nelson Mandela
Enjoy today's featured quote by Booth Tarkington! http://t.co/BU8NAmVxsu
Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age. - Booth Tarkington http://t.co/Hrr54MhHxF
Enjoy today's featured quote by Louis Pasteur! http://t.co/PFHL1lVgHl
Fortune favors the prepared mind. - Louis Pasteur http://t.co/9IgG4lGNCO
Enjoy today's featured quote by Millard Fillmore! http://t.co/LUNBV8hCRa
It is not strange... to mistake change for progress. - Millard Fillmore http://t.co/Ia9zxatxoi
Enjoy today's featured quote by Ruth Benedict! http://t.co/KOsHghZCHj
The trouble with life isn't that there is no answer, it's that there are so many answers. - Ruth Benedict http://t.co/oheXerbad5
Happy Birthday Zora Neale Hurston http://t.co/toFtVv0nFu
Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place. - Zora Neale Hurston http://t.co/zYVlVddDmV
Enjoy our Quote of the Day by Georges Braque http://t.co/tWcHApqobI
Truth exists; only lies are invented. - Georges Braque http://t.co/ZeqqKCjGEB
Enjoy this Quote of the Day by Bill Copeland http://t.co/afu8CJ42Om
Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell. - Bill Copeland http://t.co/TsHulGXKna
Enjoy our Quote of the Day by Henry Drummond http://t.co/Cu9rOO03me
Happiness... consists in giving, and in serving others. - Henry Drummond http://t.co/LsQ5AJCYEG
Enjoy our Quote of the Day by Pedro Calderon de la Barca http://t.co/7pLaZIaBQu
Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises. - Pedro Calderon de la Barca http://t.co/I74yPGdhtt
Enjoy our Quote of the Day by Thomas Shadwell http://t.co/wh7Hag88es
Every man loves what he is good at. - Thomas Shadwell http://t.co/v7LVKivEL2
Enjoy this Quote of the Day by Victor Hugo http://t.co/CZgYV47iap
To love beauty is to see light. - Victor Hugo http://t.co/p1ZqA4hePq
Enjoy today's featured Quote of the Day by William Gilmore Simms! http://t.co/2l6MO59nES
The only true source of politeness is consideration. - William Gilmore Simms http://t.co/1cCwluL7OP
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.- Martin Luther http://t.co/rbeUjlnINK
Enjoy today's featured quote by Albert Camus! http://t.co/CQiAGxb2uP
You cannot create experience. You must undergo it. - Albert Camus http://t.co/6KAND05cO8
Enjoy our bonus quote of the day by Stendhal! http://t.co/cItuT8qNMT
One can acquire everything in solitude except character. - Stendhal http://t.co/Pme6Tk9p0h
Enjoy today's featured quote by Charles R. Swindoll! http://t.co/l6Xt2Qd2Su
